   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   60:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   61:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   62:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   63:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   64:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   65:          renegotiate_error/0,
   66:          renegotiate_error/1,
   67:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/0,
   68:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/1,
   69:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/0,
   70:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/1
   71:         ]).
   72: 
   73: 
   74: %% Test callback
   75: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   76: 
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: all() -> 
   81:     [
   82:      cert_groups()
   83:     ].
   84: 
   85: groups() ->
   86:     [
   87:      {rsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()},
   88:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
   89:     ].
   90: 
   91: cert_groups() ->
   92:     [{group, rsa},
   93:      {group, ecdsa}].
   94: 
   95: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
   96:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
   97:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
   98:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
   99:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  100:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  101:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
  102:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
  103:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  104:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  105:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  106:      renegotiate_error,
  107:      client_cert_fail_alert_active,
  108:      client_cert_fail_alert_passive   
  109:     ].
  110: legacy_tests() ->
  111:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  112:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  113:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  114:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  115:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  116:      tls12_client_tls_server].
  117: 
  118: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  119:     catch crypto:stop(),
  120:     try crypto:start() of
  121: 	ok ->
  122:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  123:                 true ->
  124:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  125:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  126:                      Config];
  127:                 false ->
  128:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  129:             end
  130:     catch _:_ ->
  131: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  132:     end.
  133: 
  134: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  135:     ssl:stop(),
  136:     application:stop(crypto).
  137: 
  138: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  139:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  140:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  141:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  142:     [{client_type, erlang},
  143:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  144:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  145: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  146:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  147:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  148:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  149:         true ->
  150:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  151:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  152:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  153:             [{client_type, erlang},
  154:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  155:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  156:         false ->
  157:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  158:     end.
  159: 
  160: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  161:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  162: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  163: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  164: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  165: 
  166: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  167:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  168: 
  169: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  171:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  172:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  173:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  174:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  175:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  176: 
  177: 
  178:     
  179: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  180:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  181:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  182: 
  183: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  184:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  185:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  186: 
  187:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  188:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  189:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  190:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  191:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  192:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  193:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  194:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  195:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  196:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  197:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  198:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  199:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  200:    
  201: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  202:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  203: 
  204: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  205:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  206:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  207:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  208:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  209:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  210:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  211: 
  212: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  213:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  214: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  215:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  216:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  217:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  218:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  219:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  220:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  221:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  222:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  223:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  224:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  225:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  226:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  227:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  228: 
  229: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  230:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  231: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  232:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  233:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  234:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  235:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  236:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  237:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  238:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  239:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  240:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  241:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  242:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  243:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  244:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  245:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  246: 
  247: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  248:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  249: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  250:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  251:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  252:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  253:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  254:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  255:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  256:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  257: 
  258: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  259:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  260: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  261:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  262:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  263:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  264:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  265:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  266:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  267:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  268:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  269:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  270:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  271:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  272:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  273:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  274: 
  275: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  276:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  277: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  278:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  279:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  280:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  281:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  282:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  283:     
  284:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  285:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  286:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  287:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  288:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  289:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  290:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  291:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  292: 
  293: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  294:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  295: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  296:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  297:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  298:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  299:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  300:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  301:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  302:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  303: 
  304: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  305:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  306: 
  307: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  308:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  309:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  310:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  311:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  312:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  313:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  314:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  315:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  316: 
  317: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  318:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  319: 
  320: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  321:     SHA = sha384,
  322:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  323:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  324:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  325:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  326:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  327:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  328:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  329:                                                                               {client_chain,
  330:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  331:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  332:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  333:                                                                              ]),
  334: 
  335:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  336:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  337:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  338:                   | ServerOpts0],
  339:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  340: 
  341: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  342:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  343: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  344:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  345:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  346:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  347:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  348:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  349:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  350: 
  351: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  352:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  353: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  354:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  355:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  356:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  357:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  358:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  359: 
  360: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  361:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  362: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  363:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  364:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  365:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  366: 
  367:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  368: 					{from, self()},
  369:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  370:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  371:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  372:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  373:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  374:                                                   {from, self()},
  375:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  376:                                                   {options,
  377:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  378:     Server ! listen,
  379:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  380:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  381:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  382:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  383:                                                      {from, self()},
  384:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  385:                                                      {options,
  386:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  387:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  388:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  389:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  390: 
  391: renegotiate_error() ->
  392:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  393: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  395:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  396:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  397: 
  398:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  399: 					{from, self()},
  400:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  401:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  402:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  403:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  404:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  405:         {ok, Socket} ->
  406:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  407:         {error, Reason} ->
  408:             ct:fail(Reason)
  409:     end.
  410: 
  411: client_cert_fail_alert_active() ->
  412:     [{doc, "Check that we receive alert message"}].
  413: client_cert_fail_alert_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  414:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  415:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  416:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  417:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  418:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  419: 
  420:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "clinet_invalid_cert.pem"),
  421:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  422: 
  423:     ClientOpts = [{active, true},
  424:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  425:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  426:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  427:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  428:                                         {from, self()},
  429:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  430:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  431:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  432:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  433:     receive
  434:         {Server, {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}}} ->
  435:             receive
  436:                 {ssl_error, Socket, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}} ->
  437:                     ok
  438:             after 500 ->
  439:                     ct:fail(no_acticv_msg)
  440:             end
  441:     end.
  442: 
  443: client_cert_fail_alert_passive() ->
  444:     [{doc, "Check that recv or setopts return alert"}].
  445: client_cert_fail_alert_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  446:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  447:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  448:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  449:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  450:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  451: 
  452:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  453:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  454: 
  455:     ClientOpts = [{active, false},
  456:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  457:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  458:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  459:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, recv,
  460:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  461:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, setopts,
  462:                   ServerNode, Hostname).
  463:  
  464: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  465: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  467: 
  468: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  469:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  470:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  471: 					{from, self()},
  472:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  473:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  474:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  475:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  476: 					{host, Hostname},
  477:                                         {from, self()},
  478:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  479:                                         {options,
  480:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  481:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  482: 
  483: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  484:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  485:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  486:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  487:             ok;
  488:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  489:             ok;
  490:         _ ->
  491:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
  492:     end.
  493: 
  494: alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, Function,
  495:               ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  496:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  497:                                         {from, self()},
  498:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  499:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  500:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  501:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  502:     ct:sleep(500),
  503:     case Function of
  504:         recv ->
  505:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0);
  506:         setopts ->
  507:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}])
  508:     end.
  509: 
  510: create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts) ->
  511:     KeyFile =  proplists:get_value(keyfile, ClientOpts),
  512:     [KeyEntry] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(KeyFile),
  513:     Key = ssl_test_lib:public_key(public_key:pem_entry_decode(KeyEntry)),
  514:     ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  515: 
  516:     [{'Certificate', ClientDerCert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  517:     ClientOTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(ClientDerCert, otp),
  518:     ClientOTPTbsCert = ClientOTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  519:     NewClientDerCert = public_key:pkix_sign(ClientOTPTbsCert, Key),
  520:     ssl_test_lib:der_to_pem(NewClientCertFile, [{'Certificate', NewClientDerCert, not_encrypted}]).
